		event_background = gallows

	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber

		event_background = bedchamber

	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:study

		event_background = study

	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.1.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:bedchamber
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 52
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 53
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 52
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 52
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 53
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 53
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 52: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE -> EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.52
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 52
				scope:first_transition_1 = 52
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 52
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 53: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE -> EventsSex.ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.53
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 53
				scope:first_transition_1 = 53
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 53
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}

	# Privileges of Power
	type = character_event

	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield

	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night

	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night

		event_background = corridor_night

	override_background = {
		trigger = {

		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard

	override_background = {

	override_background = {

	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = feast

	override_background = {
		trigger = {

		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.4.desc
	}
	immediate = {

			name = locale
			value = flag:study
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 58
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 59
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 58
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 58
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 59
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 59
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 58: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL -> EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.58
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 58
				scope:first_transition_1 = 58
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 4
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 58
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 59: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL -> EventsSex.ASS_TEASE

		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 59

			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 4
		}

			name = sex_transition
			value = 59

			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion

LIDAf.5 = {
	# Mead in my Room?
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.5.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.5.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:bedchamber
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 60
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 61
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 60
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 60
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 61
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 61
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 60: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_LIEGE -> EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.60
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 60
				scope:first_transition_1 = 60
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 5
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 60
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 61: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_LIEGE -> EventsSex.ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.61
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 61
				scope:first_transition_1 = 61
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 5
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 61
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.6 = {
	# An Intimate Discussion
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.6.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = throne_room_bow_1
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.6.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:council_chamber
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 62
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 63
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 62
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 62
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 63
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 63
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 62: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.62
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 62
				scope:first_transition_1 = 62
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 6
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 62
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 63: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.63
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 63
				scope:first_transition_1 = 63
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 6
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 63
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.7 = {
	# Taste of Heaven in Hell
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.7.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = prisonhouse
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.7.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:dungeon
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 64
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 65
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 64
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 64
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 65
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 65
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 64: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_PRISONER -> EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.64
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 64
				scope:first_transition_1 = 64
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 7
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 64
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 65: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_PRISONER -> EventsSex.ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.65
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 65
				scope:first_transition_1 = 65
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 7
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 65
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}

LIDAf.8 = {
	# The Sweetest Torture
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.8.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = prisonhouse
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.8.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:dungeon
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 66
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 67
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 66
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 66
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 67
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 67
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 66: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL -> EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.66
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 66
				scope:first_transition_1 = 66
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 8
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 66
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 67: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL -> EventsSex.ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.67
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 67
				scope:first_transition_1 = 67
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 8
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 67
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.9 = {
	# Who Owns Who
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.9.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.9.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:sitting_room
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 68
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 69
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 68
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 68
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 69
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 69
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 68: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE -> EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.68
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 68
				scope:first_transition_1 = 68
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 9
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 68
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 69: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE -> EventsSex.ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.69
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 69
				scope:first_transition_1 = 69
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 9
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 69
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.10 = {
	# A Chance Encounter
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.10.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.10.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:courtyard
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 70
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 71
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 70
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 70
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 71
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 71
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 70: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.70
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 70
				scope:first_transition_1 = 70
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 10
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 70
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 71: EventsFirst.MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.71
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 71
				scope:first_transition_1 = 71
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 10
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 71
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}
